refnamediv.refpurpose: Specify the method how the SNMP values will be returned

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
method
types
SNMP_VALUE_LIBRARY The return values will be as returned by the Net-SNMP library.
SNMP_VALUE_PLAIN The return values will be the plain value without the SNMP type hint.
SNMP_VALUE_OBJECT
The return values will be objects with the properties "value" and "type", where the latter is one of the SNMP_OCTET_STR, SNMP_COUNTER etc. constants. The way "value" is returned is based on which one of constants SNMP_VALUE_LIBRARY, SNMP_VALUE_PLAIN is set.
